A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The fanboys are dragging this movie down. It’s a solid movie\, and contained all the Star Wars elements we’ve come to expect. It’s certainly not flawless and there are parts of it that didn’t do it for me. It entertained me and that’s really all that is important when going to see a movie. I’ll definitely see it again for a more objective take but on first viewing it didn’t disappoint.
